title.jp: Koushite Karera no Machigatta Seishun ga Hajimaru.

synopsis: After writing a less than flattering essay about his high school life, Hachiman is forced to join a very unique club with only one member.

title.jp: Kitto, Dareshimo Hitoshi Nami ni Nayami wo Kakaeteiru.

synopsis: As Hachiman continues his narrative of his school life, tension rises in the room as Yui attempts to break away from her social group. If that wasn’t enough, the club has received a new request from a unique visitor.

title.jp: Tamani Rabu Kome no Kami-sama wa ii Koto wo Suru.

synopsis:
Hachiman continues his solitary lifestyle by using his skills to ensure he is left alone during gym and lunch. His routine is broken by the appearance of Saika Tosuka, who has come 
to him with a request.

title.jp: Tsumari, Kare wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai.

synopsis: Hachiman questions what it is like having a sister in real life means. While walking her to school she brings up the car accident he was in while saving a dog. At school, he is once again berated by Shizuka on his response to the “Career Observation Application survey”. When he finally makes it to the club room, a mysterious text sets off the clubs next request.

title.jp: Mata Shite mo, Kare wa Moto Kita Michi e Hikikaesu.

synopsis: Hachiman's younger sister, Hikigaya Komachi, was asked to give advice to a fellow classmate, Kawasaki Taishi. Apparently his sister had been acting strange. His older sister, Kawasaki Saki (though Hachiman wasn't aware of this), was in the same class as Hachiman and Yui, so the Service Club decided to help with the issue. They come up with various ways to try to dissuade Saki from her suspicious activities, but...

title.jp: Youyaku Kare to Kanojo no Hajimari ga Owaru.

synopsis: After their confirmation things are different between Hachiman and Yui, Hachiman revels that he was able to reset his relationship with Yui, while Yui stops attended club meetings. Shizuka informs them that they need to go on a recruitment drive and Yukino knows the perfect person.

title.jp: Tomoare, Natsuyasuminanoni Yasumenai no wa Nanikaokashii.

synopsis: Trying to rest during summer vacation, Shizuka constantly calls and text. Komachi breaks the cycle when she Hachiman agrees to take her to Chiba. But before they make it to the station…

title.jp: Izure Karera Kanojora wa Shinjitsu wo Shiru.

synopsis: Shizuka readies a bonfire and a “test of courage.” Later, Yui recognizes the limo that hit Hachiman.

title.jp: Mitabi, Kare wa Moto Kita Michi e Hikikaesu.

synopsis: Hachiman becomes restless as summer draws to an end. A Firework Festival opens the door for more teasing and many SNAFUs!

title.jp: Izentoshite Karera no Kyori wa Kawarazu ni, Matsuri wa Mousugu Carnival.

synopsis: Yui notices a rift forming between Hachiman and Yukino. Hachiman is nominated to serve on the committee for the school’s upcoming cultural festival.

title.jp: Soshite, Sorezore no Butai no Maku ga Agari, Matsuri wa Saikou ni Festival tte Iru.

synopsis: Hachiman and Yui check on Yukino. Later, Hachiman shakes things up with the committee when he decides to alter their mindset.

title.jp: Koushite, Kare to Kanojo to Kanojo no Seishun wa Machigai Tsudzukeru.

synopsis: Soubu High's Cultural Festival continues and Hachiman is stuck carrying out his duty as a committee member by documenting the day's events on film.

title.jp: Dakara, Karera no Matsuri wa Owaranai.

synopsis: A mysterious request to helm the upcoming sports festival arrives. The group must band together to figure out a way to pull it off.
